headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Bath and Body Works Is Shifting After Recent Earnings Setback
summary: Bath & Body Works stock has seen a modest upward revision in its fair value estimate to $24.35 per share, even as Wall Street sentiment has generally turned more cautious after recent earnings disappointments. The higher revenue growth outlook of 36.7% reflects a belief that ongoing investments in digital, product innovation, and distribution can still unlock a stronger top line than previously modeled, despite near term reset dynamics. Read on to see how you can stay on top of these evolving...
